definition: abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

pinyin: Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4 Gong4 he2 guo2
Sai1 er3 wei2 ya4 Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4 yu3

sentences.english: In terms of its achievement in the Summer Olympics, Croatia's men handball team is the current Olympic champions.
sentences.chinese: 克羅地亞男子手球隊是目前的奧運會冠軍。

sentences.english: Ever since Krajina was independent and separate entity from Croatia.
sentences.chinese: 自從克拉伊納是來自克羅地亞的獨立和單獨的實體。

sentences.english: Croatia is well-known for its preserved environment and unspoilt surroundings.
sentences.chinese: 克羅地亞是衆所周知的完好的環境和未受破壞的環境。

sentences.english: A string of tiny islands scattered off the Croatian coast are up for sale.
sentences.chinese: 一羣散佈在克羅地亞沿海的小島正在出售中。

sentences.english: This unit took part in anti-partisan operations in Croatia.
sentences.chinese: 這個單位在克羅地亞參與反黨羽操作。

sentences.english: However, she did want to know what people in Britain thought about the war in Croatia.
sentences.chinese: 然而她確實想知道英國人關於克羅地亞戰爭的想法。

sentences.english: The president of Croatia and his wife Tanja posed for a picture with Angelina Jolie.
sentences.chinese: 克羅地亞總統和他的妻子塔尼婭與安吉合影。

sentences.english: The Croatian people hold profound friendship with the Chinese people.
sentences.chinese: 克羅地亞人民對中國人民懷有深厚的友情。

sentences.english: It has started membership negotiations with Croatia and, most momentously, with Turkey.
sentences.chinese: 此外，歐盟業已起動與克羅地亞的入盟談判，以及。

sentences.english: I've enjoyed my time in Croatia. The people here are so open-hearted and hospitable.
sentences.chinese: 我在克羅地亞過得很愉快，這兒的人外向而熱情好客。

sentences.english: Croatian Parliament Speaker Luka Bebic extended profound condolences to the victims.
sentences.chinese: 克羅地亞議長貝比奇向遇難者表示深切哀悼。

sentences.english: Croatian President Ivo Josipovic expressed sincere condolences to China over the earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 克羅地亞總統約西波維奇向中方表示深切慰問。
森林步道，十六，克羅地亞。

sentences.english: Yet further - and much more recent - symbols of ethnic conflict awaited in Croatia.
sentences.chinese: 然而，更多更新的種族爭鬥見證還在克羅地亞等我。

sentences.english: I don't think any of the Crotian team would get into our team.
sentences.chinese: 我不認爲克羅地亞能夠戰勝我們。

sentences.english: Croatia comes top—but it could do better.
sentences.chinese: 克羅地亞名列榜首，但是它其實能做得更好。

definition: St Paul/São Paulo, city in Brazil
